system.descriptor: Exceptionally rare, these soulles beings are voids in the warp who drain its strength by their mere presence, causing immense pain to Psykers and warp-creatures. Even those without psychic powers find their presence unpleasent.
system.uses: Character can no longer become a Psyker. Gain Resistance (Psychic Powers) talent, halve Fellowship characeristic (rounding up) for purposes of all tests or other game usages. Treat Fellowship Characteristic as a 1 when interacting with anyone possessing the Psyniscience skill. Gain never benefit from any Psychic Powers or any other talent, trait, or ability that calls on the Warp. Automatically ignore results of Psychic Phenomena, gain a +30 to resist effects of Perils of the Warp. Gain access to a set of Untouchable Elite Advances.

description.value: Exceptionally rare, these soulles beings are voids in the warp who drain its strength by their mere presence, causing immense pain to Psykers and warp-creatures. Even those without psychic powers find their presence unpleasent.
